name: Trend Vision One
description: This plugin is used to fetch Domains, File SHA-256, IP address (IPv4, IPv6) and URLs from the Suspicious Object List. This plugin allows sharing of Domains, File SHA-256, IP address (IPv4, IPv6) and URLs to Trend Vision One's Suspicious Object List or Exception List. For suspicious objects added through third-party intelligence and manual operations, there is a maximum limit for each object type. For more information, refer to Trend Vision One API documentation.

configuration.label: Data Region
configuration.description: Select the data region from which you want to pull your data from.

configuration.label: Authentication Token
configuration.description: Authentication Token to access Trend Vision One APIs. Authentication Token can be generated from the 'Trend Vision One Portal > Administration > API Keys' page.

configuration.label: Enable Polling
configuration.description: Enable/Disable polling data from Trend Vision One.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.
